website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically pleasing comforter set with beautiful decorative pillows included.
pros: Color block design is bold and stylish
Has a quilted look to it
Set includes comforter, pillow shams, a bed skirt, and a few decorative pillows
Soft polyester material is comfortable and warm
Safe for machine wash and dry
cons: Sits at a higher price point than other comparable sets
Neck pillow subject to tearing easily

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but quality could be better Worth the cost to purchase
customer_reviews.text: when I purchased this I was expecting a lot and in reality it was just as pretty in person I can't stop looking at it. My husband and I wanted something that wasn't girl and it wasn't overly manly rather something for both of us so we picked this! I got black sheets on it so it wouldn't be to girly and wouldn't stain (we have pets and kids) I love how it already went with my pillows from my last set but came with a few of its own well worth the $60
customer_reviews.author: mama reviews

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Materials
customer_reviews.text: I have already returned this comforter and made a purchased I can see and feel from Burlington... currently waiting on my refund. The outer shell material is so thin and cheap you can see the inner fluffy material and then there’s out of place stitching and the color isn’t so vibrant as it appears online. Notice the colors and the stitching at the top right in the picture submitted.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and received it today as you can see it arrived with a huge hole in it. Unsure how quality control could have missed this. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted by Bed Bugs in a Bag in Mesa Arizona
customer_reviews.text: This Bed in a Bag came complete with Bed Bugs in a Bag. Which came directly from ECity Direct. I would never order anything from Amazon that would be coming from ECity Direct. They absoluteley refused to do anyting to help rememdy this disgusting problem, which cost us thousands to get rid of. We had to have our house fumigated a few times, we had to get rid of all of our mattress, pillows, blankets, carpet. It was a complete nightmare for a few months. When we opened the bed in a bag and put it on the bed within a couple of hours the bed bugs were all over. Completely Disgusting...
customer_reviews.author: Ssndra Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors and awesome price😃
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning on my new canopy bed! Awesome colors and awesome price😃
customer_reviews.author: April d inman

customer_reviews.title: It's a steal!
customer_reviews.text: It was a very speedy delivery, got here on time. It is actually really attractive on the bed. I have a King size bed, large head board. It is beautiful. Now I will say that the side of the comforter don't hang as much as much as I initially thought, but that doesn't even bother me. Especially because the quality of the blanket it really great for what I paid for it. It looks beautiful, it's soft to the touch, it's pretty thick, and the design is pleasing as well, The throw pillow are pretty comfortable as well! I love it, honestly!
customer_reviews.author: IG @GAIAGRAPHY101

customer_reviews.title: And worst thing is they used brown thread on a portion ...
customer_reviews.text: Sage and Aqua Blue color shown in pic isn't an accurate representation. Sage is more a baby poop green while the aqua blue is more of an aqua blue green. Also there was a yellow stain on the white portion of the comforter right where the handle of the packaging was located. And worst thing is they used brown thread on a portion of the blue portion of the comforter. Sending back for a replacement and hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in more ways than price.....
customer_reviews.text: This looked fairly true to the picture. The comforter is thin, which is good for Florida, and the quality is fairly questionable. Mine didn't have circles sewn in weird places, but it did have lines and the thread was the color of the dark purple, so they are quite obvious in the lavender and beige sections of the comforter. Its a shame, because it is perfect for my daughter's room, and looks great. Fortunately, since she is in college, it won't be getting much use, so I will keep it. Not sure it will hold up well, but I guess you get what you pay for??? Hoping it lasts at least a few years.....
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: How do you like random circles stitched in your comforter?
customer_reviews.text: So when sewing a blanket or a quilt, a person will have to sew in a sort of anchor that will hold the inner lining in place. The manufacturer or designer of this particular comforter decided to to this by seeing various uneven circles around the comforter in a dark navy blue thread. This was done on all parts of the comforter including on the lighter colors. This could of been done with smaller incisions and it is a shame because the pattern and materials are actually quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would say I love it but
customer_reviews.text: I would say I love it but....it is not made for households with animals. The fur clings to it. It needs to be cleaned a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JANINE M. ABEL

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality, wouldn't make the reject bin
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews. Photo shows a nice plush quiltwd comforter. Not even close. maybe an inch thick. feels like a very thin layer of batting sewn into it. Sewn in half heartedly by the way with brown threaded circles through out the design. The batting is also uneven. And by that I mean one side is super thin but there are big wads of it in some of the corners. One wash and it's over for this balnket. The pattern is appealing. Thats about as good as it gets with this set. Very poorly made. The bes skirt even had splotches of glue all over it.
customer_reviews.author: shelly m

customer_reviews.title: Gives my room a different look 😉
customer_reviews.text: Love the design the pattern fits my queen bed perfect... glad I ordered it..
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: NOT gray like the description says
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality comforter. I like that it came with the accent pillows. The pillow shams seem to be good quality. The only thing I was a little disappointed in is that the description calls this blue and gray. There is no gray in in. The lighter color is taupe and the other is a light sage. When I ordered it, the stock picture looked gray on my computer and sage on my phone. Since I was unsure, I went with the description. It is still beautiful and my son loves it, it just doesn't match his light gray curtains (not pictured) and ob think itv would have looked better in his room if it was gray.
customer_reviews.author: SKB

customer_reviews.title: Hate it. Colors dingy and ruined in washer
customer_reviews.text: Update: Put it in the wash as there were mixed reviews and I can tell you that it was the worst thing that happened. This is garbage after 3 months. The colours definitely are not as pictured. The blue will not be popping, it is a soft light blue and the green is more olive than sage. Like others have written the quality of sewing is disappointing. For the price though I am keeping it until I find exactly what I am looking for. Wish I would have bought a different one. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: MSternberg001

customer_reviews.title: DRY CLEAN ONLY
customer_reviews.text: It says on the label that it is machine washable, however, when i washed mine it was in cold water, delicate, and dried tumble dry with NO heat. Now, The inside stuffing is messed up, threads held up (which surprised me). With that being said, the thing that upset me the most was that it Shrink to where now it barely covers the top of my California King bed. That was the main selling point was the size. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H

customer_reviews.title: Faded and Ugly - Immediately Returned
customer_reviews.text: These people are deceptive, best to stay far away. Sage green = yellow gray-green and Aqua blue = dull grayish blue. Even the item label is a lie! The difference between the item I received and the picture of it on its own packaging is night and day. Gross, ugly colors and absolutely nothing like it is described. I uploaded a picture that shows the difference between the claimed colors and the actual colors. You will see that the blue in the label is vibrant and bright while the blue on the comforter is barely qualified to be called blue, etc. The green is just too ugly for words.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Brusch

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with the quality of workmanship of this item. there was stitching with completely different colors in random areas of the comforter where the stitching was not needed. I realize it was advertised for a low price, but if it's defective than advertise it as such so the buyer is aware. The comforter is very lightweight so it would be more for decoration than for warmth. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.... until I had to wash it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at my airbnb. It looked great on the bed but when I washed it ..what an absolute bunched up/wadded up mess the stuffing became. Its unusable at this point. Obviously its something that will need a lot of washing. very disappointed in this purchase. I had to purchase something else. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa4r

customer_reviews.title: Be honest - do you really enjoy sharing a blanket with you significant other?
customer_reviews.text: After fighting over one blanket with my husband for the past few years, we finally decided to buy another comforter so we could each have our own. I like to get the most out of my money so this set was perfect. Not only did it come with seven pieces and match our bedroom decor, but the blanket is phenomenal. It should be known that my husband and I have oil heating and rather than pay for the ridiculous cost of oil prices, we keep our house at a brisk 60 degrees. This blanket does a wonderful job at keeping us warm and toasty. I would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The sheet cover had no meaning without fitting sheets not provided. They should of gave out a set of sheet via three cheap pillows. The blanket had a few long blues sewing flaws which leads to cheap and no quality of the unit the material also is cheap not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyboy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Must Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its really good and feels good. Half quilt and puffy cotton feel. Definitely a must buy! The only negative comment is after washing it, it gets really wrinkled. I thought my dry would have straightened it out. When I put it on the bed I relaize I should have used wrinkle free on the dryer because it gets crazy wrinkled. Also it's a Cal size. Its fits just doesnt hang all the way to mid way. Sorry I took pics but it wont let me add them
customer_reviews.author: Humanbeing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it and nice quality. It’s just as pictured and is soft. Have washed it a few times since I got it and still holding up. No complaints. Will buy again if this one gets to beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Mix reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter a while back, it's a king size. We were looking for a bed. So when we finally bought a king size bed I had all the necessary bedding. I pulled out the conforter and there it was, it looked like someone returned it. Because it had marks on it. I have pictures. Then there are sewing circles on the brown and maroon in BLACK. I must say though it keeps you warm and keeps the heat in if you jump out for a minute. It also is not as classy as it looks in the picture. Very casual conforter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Colors much softer/lighter than pictured but still nice. Quality is relative to price point
customer_reviews.text: Colors much softer/lighter than pictured but still nice. Quality is relative to price point. Random circle Stitching on light blocks with dark thread is weird?? My son is content with it.. but if it was for my room I probably would’ve returned it. Given that...I wasn’t expecting much more for the price. Good enough for kids or maybe spare room. Have yet to see how it holds up in wash?? Afraid that it will bunch up!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great color and feel!
customer_reviews.text: The color and feel is absolutely wonderful. My room is transformed and the little pillows are great for creating a relaxing rest. The comforter is one of the softest I have slept in. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Legg

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to match the purple curtains in my room and ran across this set for roughly $60. It was delivered very quickly; only a few issues. The bed skirt had holes, but wasn't too big of a deal since it's where my mattress would lay. A few issues with the stitching in certain areas but honestly, for the price, I'm not complaining too much. Overall I'm content with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first comforter set that I bought so much that I bought another when I damaged the first one. I ordered the exact same item, and was shocked when the replacement comforter arrived. Although the pattern was the same, the material was cheaply made, and there was literally half of the filling as the original one I bought 6 weeks earlier. I am in disbelief that the workmanship was so inferior....
customer_reviews.author: Ann R Torgersen

customer_reviews.title: King size is poor quality. Queen was better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the yellow and grey one in the queen size for my daughter. She loved it and it’s held up great. When we needed one for our king, I bought again. Well the king isn’t near as thick nor durable. We already have several tear in the comforter and we’re not near as hard on it as our daughter is with her. Quality just isn’t the same. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: The product is so/so. It's what you would expect ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is so/so. It's what you would expect for the price, but the stuffing is slightly low and the pillows are not all that spectacular. I likely would not purchase this product again or Chezmoi collection again.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: It falls apart after 1 wash
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed set since March 5th. All I do is sleep in my bed. I'm not doing flips with my comforter. It has ripped once and so I sewed it back and now there is another rip. Also the padding on the inside of the blanket is falling down already. Kinda ridiculous i spent good money on this bed set and it's just falling apart less than 2 months later. And they wont refund my purchase either. Wont ve viying from this stupid company again. Crappy crappy crappy product. Do NOT RECOMMEND this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Comforter arrived damaged. The reasons I am not returning it are fabric glue and I love the colors. Definitely not worth the price. The colored top layer is thinner then paper. It says you can machine wash it but I would not dare as I am confident that would completely destroy it. Better quality comforters are available at Walmart 20 dollars cheaper then what I paid for this. What a shame. On the plus side it does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: This comforter feels absolutely amazing and the price was amazing as well. We bought the yellow/ gray and all of the items arrived as described in the about section. The pictures were fairly accurate when determining color. The only fault I found is that they used a gray thread for some of the seams on the yellow material.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Butler-Carson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This bed set was a great deal and I love the colors and the feel of it. Its pretty heavy for a comforter so great for cooler weather for sure. I bought grey sheets to go with it and it gives my room the elegant tough that I wanted. The pillows are very well made and look great! I would definitely buy this set in other colors for sure. Very well made
customer_reviews.author: story reader

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough, lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: Stitches have popped after roughly a year of use leaving a large tear in the middle of the comforter. It is okay comfort-wise, however I would recommend something more durable. update: Bought A 2nd because I like the pattern. It lasted less than 2 months before a seam popped. I advise that you not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Chezmoi is French for "Mindf--k"
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not great quality. Get what you pay for. Still has somewhat of that cheaper "Walmartie" option feel on the blue and green fabric, but the heavier grey textured part it screams quality quilt. Very confusing. Slept with it (Platonically) for almost 2 weeks now and like it a lot. Looks really nice when I actually make my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Robian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of durability
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design and look of this product. I would have given a 5 star rating if I had reviewed it prior to washing the bed spread. It did not hold up in the first wash. It got a pulled string and made the whole thing off center. After the second wash there were small wholes starting in the seems. Unfortunately, by then it was to late to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: It's held up well.
customer_reviews.text: It's about done now, but I've had it for 5 years. 5 years where it gets washed at least once a month because we have a cat and a dog that sleep with us. To me, that's pretty sturdy. 5 years is time for a change anyway. But, I will keep it as an extra blanket. I would buy it again, if I didn't want to change.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my king size bed. Colors in picture are what you get. The comforter is light and soft, but still warm. The pillow cases and accent pillows add the perfect touch, and since they were one set made it so simple. The perfect combination of of colors that still have a feminine feel but that your man won't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart during washing
customer_reviews.text: Loved this until I washed it. Used commercial washer followed directions and it basically fell apart in the wash. Loved this, it was soft comfortable and perfect until it fell apart
customer_reviews.author: Candice Mikkelson

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Comfortable and Warm this Comforter is Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I love this comforter; it is soft to the touch and oh so cozy. I was shopping at amazon for a down comforter for winter but when I saw this comforter I thought the pattern would appeal to my husbands tastes and the colors matched our color theme, plus it was on sale. All fabulous features and benefits. I am very happy that I bought this comforter, because it provides us warmth and looks modern. Know that my husband will remove this comforter from our bed to cuddle with on the sofa in his mancave. .
customer_reviews.author: Susang6

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as represented.
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, however the colors are not as rich as pictured. The red is more of a wine, which actually works out well. The product itself seems to be high quality, however I was disappointed when the colors were muted and not bold as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: NMDellarocco

customer_reviews.title: Quality Material, Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: I waited to do my review, the colors are vibrant, it has withheld 2 restless sleepers, the material is not scratchy and is soft, the pattern and colors are what we are looking for to finish the room with, it came with a lot of pillows so it is fun to toss them around. I am not sure how long the stitching will last, some places in the spread the stitching doesn't look strong, but for the price I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Marie Strong

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you ever intend on washing it.
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived and was nice. It had some decorative pillows. It wasn’t as fluffy at it appears in the photo. I washed it on gentle and put it in the dryer on low setting. It was ruined when it came out. The stitching bunched and the threads on the quilted part pulled and cannot be fixed. Didn’t even get to use it once.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Merrick

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking set. Unfortunately, the stitching that holds the "stuffing" in place doesn't hold, and the stuffing is bunching up in the ends. I know that the first time I wash this thing, it's done.
customer_reviews.author: J. D

customer_reviews.title: Color not what I expected and bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: From the pictures on the website I expected deep purple, lavender, and grey but in reality it was deep purple, very pale lavender and what I would consider beige. I was disappointed in the lack of vibrancy because I was using the bedspread to add color to the room. Also, weird stitching right down the middle 1/3 on both sides using deep purple, even on the light lavender and the "grey" and where the dark purple should look "smooth". Looks really strange. I don't think this will wash well because filling is loose inside. I would not recommend if you are decorating and want fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item and it was delivered on Sunday...Barely put it on our bed and come to find out both pillow cases and a part of the comforter were ripped at the seams...horrible quality for the price, it's not worth the hassle after it's open and try and repackage to send back!! Would never buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by all of the negative reviews. I am not sure what people were expecting for what they were paying. For the price I paid, I am very happy with my purchase. Not sure how long it will hold up, but so far, I really like it. Looks very nice on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: I wake up all through the night drenched in sweat
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that’s good about this purchase is that it’s so appealing to the eye! I love the appearance but definitely the WORST quilt I’ve ever owned. If you enjoy sweating all night long, and enjoy the sounds of random tearing from cheap stitching, THEN LOOK NO MORE! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Seth Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter Set
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is the exact color as the picture. I really like that it is not bulky thick, especially since it is very hot this summer! Washing it was easy, it fit just right in the washing machine and dryer. What I like mostly about it was the decor pillows that came with it and of course the quality of the material. I highly recommend this set if you like maroon/brown colors!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Colors misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these comforter sets. One in blue and gray, one in green and brown. My husband surprised me and set them up on the beds, throwing away the bags and tags. I was excited to see them on the beds. Sadly, they look nothing like the photos represented online. The colors were dull and misrepresented. In fact, they almost look the same even though they should be two completely different color schemes. Very disappointed and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: Update: it was put on the bed on the 16th this was noticed on the 25th and 2 nights the bed wasn’t even slept in. My sister was super surprised to open this gift when she received it. It was a speedy order and delivery. But please pay attention it does NOT come with a sheet set. I was unaware of that and did not pay attention to that factor, luckily she had sheets that matched already.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was made cheap and with cheap material. I was very disappointed, however it does serve it's purpose. Update: after a couple washes, it fell apart. TERRIBLE QUALITY. I bought a cover to replace this one from somewhere else for less than I paid for this one and I’m much happier with the new one. I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of comforter sets in the past and this by far beats any of them! I have already washed this several times and have not lost its fluff, comfort, or cozy texture. Does not come with a sheet set so you would have to purchase separately which I knew upon purchase. Best money I have spent for my bed thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas E. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper....
customer_reviews.text: It was all wrinkly and strings appear to be coming out of it. It looks very cheaply made. Very unhappy. Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Trust Me, I Bought It

customer_reviews.title: the colors werent accurate
customer_reviews.text: iam disappoint #1 the comforter isnt blue ,grey like how the picture states its acutally blue .light brown with mint green i ordered it because i like the cowboys i was going 2 add cowboys item on the bed #2 i have decided 2 keep it because of the quality and plus it took a week and half 2 get it i had alreadypurchased curtains that matched the picture
customer_reviews.author: elbony brown

customer_reviews.title: Muted colours
customer_reviews.text: This is good value for the price, 3 cushions plus 2 shams are included. The reason I gave it a 3 is the colours don’t have any punch, they are muted blues and greens. The product is thick and warm, soft and large.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Sally

customer_reviews.title: 🤩😎
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful comforter. It’s not too thick but also not too thin. Haven’t washed it yet but it seems to be quality. It’s nothing luxurious, i’m not going to sugarcoat it but for the price it’s good equality. Also I didn’t notice any weird smells when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Shahin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a higher quality of material for this product. It feels very cheaply made. It is not wrinkle free and it smells heavily of chemicals. The colors are pretty and it has enough stuffing for the dog bed so that is where I will be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Swanstrom

customer_reviews.title: Bed in bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty but I don’t like the stitching. The way it’s stitched keeps it from being able to lay flat when you make up your bed. It’s not horrible but I wish it was a little better on how it was made cause it is pretty. Besides that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, different color
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and feel for the money! The only reason it doesn't get a higher rating from me is that the colors in the picture are much brighter/more pastel than it really is. The brown is slightly lighter, the green is a darker olive color, and the blue is grayer. The first picture is accurate - The second one is with flash on so you can see what it may look like in a brighter room.
customer_reviews.author: Shalor S.

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disappointed and disgusted, arrived June 14 it's now June 28 and the seems are already coming un stitched on comforter. Cozy and pretty disgusting it's falling apart less than 20days..
customer_reviews.author: Diversely Able

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to give my bedroom a new look. However after washing and drying on low the comforter did not hold up (1st washing) I’m disappointed in the material very cheap not like the other comforters I have.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Too small and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: The dust ruffle is not big enough for a queen at all, the throw pillows look lumpy, and the comforter is a bit small with several lumps. Not good for a queen size bed at all
customer_reviews.author: Chad H

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a guest room. It’s cheap and the sheets and pillowcases show it. Will be afraid to wash comforter for fear it won’t stay together. Discoloration throughout the fabric. Not happy with it, but didn’t want to put everything tucked back together to return. It LOOKS nice though. Mother in law slept on it and didn’t complain! Lol
customer_reviews.author: dmb4500

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!! Do not receive what you see!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is not what is shown. Seems are off and not straight. Very cheaply made, looks like it will fall apart after first wash. Dark grey seems randomly put everywhere, even on yellow fabric. AWEFUL, I'm so disappointed and am returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific quality and more for lesser price
customer_reviews.text: I am truly truly blown away. I have bought several items like this for four times the price and not the quality of this one. You guys got it right. I have told all my friends I have 10 people that's ordering right now.thanks
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste the money
customer_reviews.text: This was poorly maid. The material is weak, after one wash the inside started to come apart and balls up in the corners. They even sewed on top of the blanket to hold the other side of the blanket in place. Looks awful.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Material
customer_reviews.text: Comforter set is cute and looks just like the picture. However, during COVID-19, I decided to wash before using. BIG MISTAKE. Even with following the care instructions, the comforter ripped and tore. The stuffing is spilling out of multiple sides. That’s just after washing. After drying, there are several burn marks from where the material melted and stuck together...creating MORE holes. I received the set Sunday and 3 days later it looks as if I had it for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sherice Redd

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss...read all the reviews before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst purchase I've made and my son loves it. It's a little on the thin side so we had to add a blanket underneath for adequate warmth. It will do for now and we'll see how it holds up after a few washes. You can see that it is on the cheap side as far as the quality of material but it looks great. I'm mixed in emotions on it but my son is happy with it. The pillows are excellent and I just don't understand why the comforter wasn't made with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darcel Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, stained, wrinkled, fluff clump
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, and overall the product is soft and pretty warm. However, it came woth yellow stains on it and very wrinckled on one side. Which neither came out very well after being washed. The fluff on the inside also clumped up in certain spots and I had to physically move it around to make it even and nkt so bumpy. Also, dark gray looks like a very dark green. I don't mind it but others may. Product is absolutely not worth the price and overall I am disappointed I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Too light. Fillings are missing on most of the spots. Not worth the money. Very cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Suraj

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after first wash!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is beautiful, but it had a chemical inky scent to it so I decided to wash it. After washing it alone, there was a rip in the seam, it was very wrinkled and I had to iron it to look presentable. Also, the fillings were bunched in the corners which was very disappointing. I will never buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Bearys

customer_reviews.title: A 3 month rating
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 3 mo now it has been washed about 7 times the stich in is still holding up and the fabric is still great honestly the material used for this is excellent the pillow cases are also holding up I figured the price of this would mean a mo down the road these would be falling apart but I was wrong I see no defects at all since I bought these back in February
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Garcia

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: very warm, soft, light weight, easy to wash. Not wrinkle free. But still comfy. Boyfriend and I really liked it we bought a second set. Although we dont that many pillows. I wish it came with a sheet set aswell
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality is bad.
customer_reviews.text: After a few washes it looks cheap and worn out. I have rips all through the comforter. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teen aged son and he loves it. Wish I would have read it better because I thought it came with sheets, but it doesnt it came with 3 pillows. He still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Schooley

customer_reviews.title: Love This Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Comforter is awesome, can turn the pattern differently on bed. Washers great but try not to put in dryer. Hang to dry outside or over shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. Finishers the room. Will look for seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look on my bed but when i had washed it, it eneded up bunching in the middle (i had hung it outside becuse i was scared it would shrink in the dryer) so im not sure iif this was due to something that ive done or just the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks rich from a far, is comfortable with pretty good quality. The 2 things I dislike was the black stitching that was random in the white part of pattern and it was slightly smaller then a normal queen size comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Lizee

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors on this comfortor. It isn't very durable though. Not meant to hold up against dogs who like to sleep in the bed. There is a hole in it after 2 months of use. But in it's defense, my dogs are kinda rough with it. I have washed it twice already and the although the filling feels very loose inside and could bunch easily, it has managed to stay in place. I'm not confident though that it will hold up against too many further washes. I do love this comfortor though and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: NON WASHABLE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this comforter set if only I didn't wash it. I live with two dogs and their hair gets everywhere. Needless to say, I needed to wash this piece. I followed the instructions on the tag for both washing and drying and to my disappointment, almost EVERY seam started to rip and the black color faded into the white stripes. Don't get me wrong this comforter set is absolutely gorgeous just don't wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the set and only withholding a star because I would have hoped for slightly more filling in the comforter itself. Regardless I love the coloring and quilted pattern. Would definately say the set is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop Baconator

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and dissatisfied customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed with with this comforter. It is absolutely beautiful. Makes our room look put together. But, the the quality is extremely poor. The threads started pulling the second week we had it on the bed. And within a month and a half one whole seam has come completely undone. We have never gotten anything from Amazon of such poor quality. I even bought curtains to go with it and now I need to find a new comforter. My husband has been on workman's comp for the last 2 yrs due to a head injury. Needless to say, I won't be able to replace this anytime soon, seeing how this one was saved for.
customer_reviews.author: D L  Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Very masculine. Looks great in mans room! Soft too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons room and it looks great. Quality is good and the fabric is soft. It isn't as thick as a regular quilt but he just put a blanket on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Macey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty and lightweight which is nice only problem I have with it is there are random weird stitches as if it was ripped and they stitched it closed and there’s 5-6 of them randomly all over the comforter which is disappointing! Update: after two months the comforter stitching has come apart and the fluff inside has came ALL out often washing it as the tag suggested!!! I DO NOT recommend this item!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my wife and I and when we first received it we loved the look and feel of the comforter. But after using it for a couple weeks whenever we would pull up the sheets when laying in bed you could hear the individual threads breaking and snapping and when we washed it for the first time the comforter had a 10 inch tear. The washer was on the delicate setting and took precautions like we do with our other comforters this product is just poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Overall great comforter
customer_reviews.text: We've had this comforter on the bed for about a year now, and it's been great! Comfortable, warm enough without overheating us during all seasons. We wash it fairly regularly, and it's held up very well. Great pattern and colors. No complaints here. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aubriellea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: It's a gorgeous set. Exactly as the picture shows. However, the only complaint I have is that there is random stitching throughout the whole comforter. For the price I won't complain since it's not a huge deal, but I can see that being an issue for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Don't put in the dryer. It's stocks together like plastic. The color is running. It's looks old now. I had it about a month. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: China Rose

customer_reviews.title: Looks likes the pictures......almost
customer_reviews.text: I think that once I wash the items I received they will plump up some, but they are a little on the flat side. I think they are perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to reviews, I knew what I was getting
customer_reviews.text: The colors aren’t vibrant, they use brown stiching for support circles on the non brown materials, the quality is “meh”-not sure it can survive the washing machine...but the price was right and it provides the warmth I was looking for (not down comforter warmth, more like a quilt).
customer_reviews.author: MS_SF

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our waterbed because the price was right and it looked nice. Once we opened it, we were surprised at the quality for the price. The material design is ok. The sewing lines are not straight at all. The white lines are crooked and noticeable but it's not a big deal for us and the reason i gave it 4 stars. If your looking for this to be a show piece then look elsewhere. Other than that, we are totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Flora

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pattern and colors but I washed it once and the batting inside clumped up.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Klein

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Stitched poorly. I've had this on my bed for 2 days and the stitching is already coming out. Not happy at all. $60 for trash.
customer_reviews.author: Heather LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Not the greatest comforter, but okay. Not the worst, but okay. Everything about it just suits me just fine. Needed a warm comforter that looked kinda snazzy and this filled the description. The overall quality doesn't seem like it'll fall apart in the next year and I don't need it to. Laying on this is not the most zen inducing experience but it gets the job done. Also on a side note, the picture of this product makes the comforter seem way fluffier than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Its feels really good. Lol. Not super thick but definitely not thin. The pillows work great. Its a great buy for me. Actually really like the look and feel of the product alot.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun L

customer_reviews.title: wears out and the blanket isnt bigger than king size blanket ~! :|
customer_reviews.text: i got the blanket then the sewing loose out and opened .. its cheap quaity sewing and the size is not biggest than king size blanket im disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anty Rydberg

customer_reviews.title: Not Made to Last
customer_reviews.text: Pillows and shams are nice. The comforter material, the dark blue part, is thin and wrinkly. The inside filler material is also very thin. Wash carefully. It is an inexpensive good looking set, but I doubt it will last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as cute as the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's warm and looks somewhat like the pictures. Cons: It's thinner than the normal. The embroidery is nice except for the random weird looking circles that have nothing to do with the pattern. I will not order from here again unless it's urgent. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R

product_meta.title: Chezmoi Collection 7-Piece Quilted Patchwork Comforter Set (Full, Burgundy/Brown/Black)
feature_bullets: Upland 7-Piece Comforter Set Includes: 1 Comforter, 2 Shams, 1 Bedskirt, 1 Cushion, 1 Neck Roll, 1 Breakfast Pillow
Measurements: Comforter 86" x 86", Shams 20" x 26", Bedskirt 54" x 75" +14" drop, Square Cushion 18" x 18", Neck Roll 7" x 18", Breakfast Pillow 12" x 18"
Luxurious pin-sonic pressed medallion quilted patchwork pattern
Soft, lightweight, and comfy fabric versatile for any bedroom décor
Care Instruction: Machine wash gentle cycle with cold water. (Sun dry or low tumble dry)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,451 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
